Frequently Asked Questions

What is Export Leadership Forum?

When is Export Leadership Forum?

Export Leadership Forum takes place on 6th and 7th October 2015.

Where is the conference?

The conference will be held at Croke Park. For more information please see the venue page.

How do I get tickets?

You can purchase tickets now. The two for one discount ends on 30th June so don't delay.

What does my ticket entitle me to?

Your ticket entitles you to entry into the Export Leadership Conference as well as access to the networking drinks.

What are the networking drinks?

Networking is one of the key benefits of Export Leadership Forum. Up to 800 senior executives across a range of export industries will be together, the business benefits are invaluable. On Tuesday 6th there will be a networking drinks party held in a location to be confirmed in August.

Is there an agenda available?

The full agenda will be released closer to the date. In the meantime you can read all about the different streams here.

Do you pay for travel?

Unfortuantely we cannot pay for travel expenses for Export Leadership Forum.

I'm interesting in partnering with the event, who do I contact?

For partnership enquiries please contact catherine.fee@exportleadership.com.

I'm interesting in exhibiting at the event, who do I contact?

For exhibition enquiries please contact catherine.fee@exportleadership.com.

I'm interesting in a media pass for the event, who do I contact?

To apply for a media pass to the Export Leadership Forum please fill in the form on the media page. For further information please contact info@exportleadership.com.

I'm interesting in volunteering at the event, who do I contact?

To apply to volunteer or to find out further information please contact info@exportleadership.com.

Do you have an anti-harassment policy?

Yes we do and we take harassment very seriously. The policy can be found on the Anti-harassment Policy Page.
